data.name: Account.NotFound
data.value: Account not found

data.name: Account.NotAccessible
data.value: You don't have access to this account

data.name: Account.HasTransactions
data.value: Cannot delete account that has transactions. Please delete or move all transactions first.

data.name: Account.AlreadyArchived
data.value: Account is already archived

data.name: Category.NotFound
data.value: Category not found

data.name: Category.NotAccessible
data.value: You don't have permission to access this category

data.name: Category.ParentNotFound
data.value: Parent category not found or not accessible

data.name: Category.HasTransactions
data.value: Cannot delete category that has transactions. Please reassign or delete all transactions in this category first.

data.name: Category.HasSubcategories
data.value: Cannot delete category that has subcategories. Please delete or move all subcategories first.

data.name: Category.CircularReference
data.value: This parent assignment would create a circular reference

data.name: Category.SelfParent
data.value: A category cannot be its own parent

data.name: Category.CannotDeleteDefault
data.value: Cannot delete the default category
